site_info.title: The Beach House LA
site_info.description: A plug-and-play hybrid recording studio in Long Beach, CA.

hero.headline: PROFESSIONAL SOUND. PRIVATE SETTING.
hero.subhead: A plug-and-play hybrid studio in Long Beach, CA.

value_prop.headline: WALK IN. PLUG IN. RECORD.
value_prop.body: We eliminated the setup time. The Beach House LA is a pre-routed, production-ready environment built for speed and texture. Analog front end, digital workflow, and instruments ready to play.

about_producer.name: Gregory David
about_producer.bio: Gregory David is a Los Angeles-based producer and multi-instrumentalist known for his organic, guitar-forward sound. Originally from New York, he honed his craft as a live musician before shifting focus to production, blending boom-bap, jazz, and R&B into a unique sonic signature. His work has amassed over 27 million streams and 180+ placements in libraries like Epidemic Sound, with credits including Netflix, Google, and Aston Martin.

services.title: PRODUCTION
services.desc: From scratch. We build the drums, layer live instrumentation, and arrange the track.

services.title: MIXING
services.desc: Hybrid mixing workflow. We run your stems through analog gear to add weight and dimension.

services.title: SESSION WORK
services.desc: Professional guitar, bass, and keys layers for your existing records.
